attributes.action: Insist all Local Authorities freeze increases in Council Tax in 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every organisation, business, and family in this country, is having to make adjustments in their budgets/spending habits as a result of the current economic climate.
Hearing Local Authorities even discuss the possibility of increases, and worst still above inflation increases reflects a complete lack of respect and understanding of the communities they serve.
I believe that the government should therefore insist on a minimum of a one year freeze, and they, like all other members of our country, should cut  their cloth to fit.
